thread.title: Bernie Sanders campaign raises over $24 million in third quarter
thread.title_full: Bernie Sanders campaign raises over $24 million in third quarter - POLITICO

author: Michael Hirsh
title: Bernie Sanders campaign raises over $24 million in third quarter
text:
Sen. Bernie Sanders' presidential campaign raised over $24 million in the third quarter of 2016, the campaign confirmed Wednesday. Sanders campaign spokeswoman Symone Sanders said the Vermont senator expected to report raising over $24 million over three months in his run for the Democratic nomination, a hefty total given that Sanders has proudly touted his refusal to endorse supporters forming a super PAC.
Story Continued Below
"We raised $24 million in this quarter and we have $25 million cash on hand," Symone Sanders told POLITICO. "We have well over one million contributions to our campaign and 650,000 individual contributors."
